00041 #define DEBUG_SUBSYSTEM S_SEC

00043 #include <libcfs/libcfs.h>
00044 #include <linux/crypto.h>

00056 
00057 struct proc_dir_entry *sptlrpc_proc_root = NULL;
00058 EXPORT_SYMBOL(sptlrpc_proc_root);
00059 
00060 static char *sec_flags2str(unsigned long flags, char *buf, int bufsize)
00061 {
00062         buf[0] = '\0';
00063 
00064         if (flags & PTLRPC_SEC_FL_REVERSE)
00065                 strlcat(buf, "reverse,", bufsize);
00066         if (flags & PTLRPC_SEC_FL_ROOTONLY)
00067                 strlcat(buf, "rootonly,", bufsize);
00068         if (flags & PTLRPC_SEC_FL_UDESC)
00069                 strlcat(buf, "udesc,", bufsize);
00070         if (flags & PTLRPC_SEC_FL_BULK)
00071                 strlcat(buf, "bulk,", bufsize);
00072         if (buf[0] == '\0')
00073                 strlcat(buf, "-,", bufsize);
00074 
00075         return buf;
00076 }
00077 
00078 static int sptlrpc_info_lprocfs_seq_show(struct seq_file *seq, void *v)
00079 {
00080         struct obd_device *dev = seq->private;
00081         struct client_obd *cli = &dev->u.cli;
00082         struct ptlrpc_sec *sec = NULL;
00083         char               str[32];
00084 
00085         LASSERT(strcmp(dev->obd_type->typ_name, LUSTRE_OSC_NAME) == 0 ||
00086                 strcmp(dev->obd_type->typ_name, LUSTRE_MDC_NAME) == 0 ||
00087                 strcmp(dev->obd_type->typ_name, LUSTRE_MGC_NAME) == 0 ||
00088                 strcmp(dev->obd_type->typ_name, LUSTRE_LWP_NAME) == 0 ||
00089                 strcmp(dev->obd_type->typ_name, LUSTRE_OSP_NAME) == 0);
00090 
00091         if (cli->cl_import)
00092                 sec = sptlrpc_import_sec_ref(cli->cl_import);
00093         if (sec == NULL)
00094                 goto out;
00095 
00096         sec_flags2str(sec->ps_flvr.sf_flags, str, sizeof(str));
00097 
00098         seq_printf(seq, "rpc flavor:    %s\n",
00099                    sptlrpc_flavor2name_base(sec->ps_flvr.sf_rpc));
00100         seq_printf(seq, "bulk flavor:   %s\n",
00101                    sptlrpc_flavor2name_bulk(&sec->ps_flvr, str, sizeof(str)));
00102         seq_printf(seq, "flags:         %s\n",
00103                    sec_flags2str(sec->ps_flvr.sf_flags, str, sizeof(str)));
00104         seq_printf(seq, "id:            %d\n", sec->ps_id);
00105         seq_printf(seq, "refcount:      %d\n",
00106                    atomic_read(&sec->ps_refcount));
00107         seq_printf(seq, "nctx:  %d\n", atomic_read(&sec->ps_nctx));
00108         seq_printf(seq, "gc internal    %ld\n", sec->ps_gc_interval);
00109         seq_printf(seq, "gc next        %ld\n",
00110                    sec->ps_gc_interval ?
00111                    sec->ps_gc_next - cfs_time_current_sec() : 0);
00112 
00113         sptlrpc_sec_put(sec);
00114 out:
00115         return 0;
00116 }
00117 LPROC_SEQ_FOPS_RO(sptlrpc_info_lprocfs);
00118 
00119 static int sptlrpc_ctxs_lprocfs_seq_show(struct seq_file *seq, void *v)
00120 {
00121         struct obd_device *dev = seq->private;
00122         struct client_obd *cli = &dev->u.cli;
00123         struct ptlrpc_sec *sec = NULL;
00124 
00125         LASSERT(strcmp(dev->obd_type->typ_name, LUSTRE_OSC_NAME) == 0 ||
00126                 strcmp(dev->obd_type->typ_name, LUSTRE_MDC_NAME) == 0 ||
00127                 strcmp(dev->obd_type->typ_name, LUSTRE_MGC_NAME) == 0 ||
00128                 strcmp(dev->obd_type->typ_name, LUSTRE_LWP_NAME) == 0 ||
00129                 strcmp(dev->obd_type->typ_name, LUSTRE_OSP_NAME) == 0);
00130 
00131         if (cli->cl_import)
00132                 sec = sptlrpc_import_sec_ref(cli->cl_import);
00133         if (sec == NULL)
00134                 goto out;
00135 
00136         if (sec->ps_policy->sp_cops->display)
00137                 sec->ps_policy->sp_cops->display(sec, seq);
00138 
00139         sptlrpc_sec_put(sec);
00140 out:
00141         return 0;
00142 }
00143 LPROC_SEQ_FOPS_RO(sptlrpc_ctxs_lprocfs);
00144 
00145 int sptlrpc_lprocfs_cliobd_attach(struct obd_device *dev)
00146 {
00147         int     rc;
00148 
00149         if (strcmp(dev->obd_type->typ_name, LUSTRE_OSC_NAME) != 0 &&
00150             strcmp(dev->obd_type->typ_name, LUSTRE_MDC_NAME) != 0 &&
00151             strcmp(dev->obd_type->typ_name, LUSTRE_MGC_NAME) != 0 &&
00152             strcmp(dev->obd_type->typ_name, LUSTRE_LWP_NAME) != 0 &&
00153             strcmp(dev->obd_type->typ_name, LUSTRE_OSP_NAME) != 0) {
00154                 CERROR("can't register lproc for obd type %s\n",
00155                        dev->obd_type->typ_name);
00156                 return -EINVAL;
00157         }
00158 
00159         rc = lprocfs_obd_seq_create(dev, "srpc_info", 0444,
00160                                     &sptlrpc_info_lprocfs_fops, dev);
00161         if (rc) {
00162                 CERROR("create proc entry srpc_info for %s: %d\n",
00163                        dev->obd_name, rc);
00164                 return rc;
00165         }
00166 
00167         rc = lprocfs_obd_seq_create(dev, "srpc_contexts", 0444,
00168                                     &sptlrpc_ctxs_lprocfs_fops, dev);
00169         if (rc) {
00170                 CERROR("create proc entry srpc_contexts for %s: %d\n",
00171                        dev->obd_name, rc);
00172                 return rc;
00173         }
00174 
00175         return 0;
00176 }
00177 EXPORT_SYMBOL(sptlrpc_lprocfs_cliobd_attach);
00178 
00179 LPROC_SEQ_FOPS_RO(sptlrpc_proc_enc_pool);
00180 static struct lprocfs_vars sptlrpc_lprocfs_vars[] = {
00181         { .name =       "encrypt_page_pools",
00182           .fops =       &sptlrpc_proc_enc_pool_fops     },
00183         { NULL }
00184 };
00185 
00186 int sptlrpc_lproc_init(void)
00187 {
00188         int rc;
00189 
00190         LASSERT(sptlrpc_proc_root == NULL);
00191 
00192         sptlrpc_proc_root = lprocfs_register("sptlrpc", proc_lustre_root,
00193                                              sptlrpc_lprocfs_vars, NULL);
00194         if (IS_ERR(sptlrpc_proc_root)) {
00195                 rc = PTR_ERR(sptlrpc_proc_root);
00196                 sptlrpc_proc_root = NULL;
00197                 return rc;
00198         }
00199         return 0;
00200 }
00201 
00202 void sptlrpc_lproc_fini(void)
00203 {
00204         if (sptlrpc_proc_root) {
00205                 lprocfs_remove(&sptlrpc_proc_root);
00206                 sptlrpc_proc_root = NULL;
00207         }
00208 }
